why: This file contanis the descriptions about some special URL and API from https://pwskills.com which is used for analysis.

url.description: This url gives about 10 data of pwskills like course, course category, instructor details and many more.
url.problem: The 'ID' of the URL maybe changes but this url is available at https://www.pwskills.com/
url.summary: Returns all courses and instructors data.

url.description: This gives all data of Full Stack Web Dev course. This URL is same as the Data Science masters URL used in analysis notebook.
url.problem: The ID of the changes but you can provide the ID of data science URL as well.
url.summary: Returns the data of Full Stack Web Dev course.

curl.problem: You have not the new bearer key if the old one changes because it get expires after 24 hours of generation.
curl.summary: You have to get the bearer key by opening the website in web browser on PC and then you can perform the requests.
